plot: A commentary on Boston's unique architecture which is a rich contrast of old and new existing together. The documentary identifies and critiques the changes that modern movement brought to Boston's architectural development.
title: Design Boston: An Architectural Journey
plot_es: A commentary on Boston's unique architecture which is a rich contrast of old and new existing together. The documentary identifies and critiques the changes that modern movement brought to Boston's architectural development.
plot_en: A commentary on Boston's unique architecture which is a rich contrast of old and new existing together. The documentary identifies and critiques the changes that modern movement brought to Boston's architectural development.
